nodes.text: Veek, also known by the nickname Veek the Sneak, was the male Rodian leader of Harido Wald, a smuggling ring operating in Mek-Sha during the Third Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and Sith Empire.
During Huttbreaker's Rebellion, Veek acquired and smuggled in the weapons used by the oppressed workers of Mek-Sha to overthrow their Hutt masters.

Veek was an ambitious individual and sought to expand the Harido Wald's reach and influence. Veek liked to conduct business in a friendly manner. Additionally, Veek liked decorating his office with gifts from satisfied customers who were happy that the merchandise Veek delivered to them came without violence or posturing involved.
